languages.text: "Ложь Архиврага пронизывает твои слова, Вольный Торговец! Подобными обещаниями власти и силы и устланы дороги, ведущие к ереси и погибели. Ты не отвратишь меня от моей стези!"
"Your words are tainted by the Archenemy's lies, Rogue Trader! Such promises of power are what pave the road to heresy and ruin. You will not lead me astray!"
languages.original_text: "Ложь Архиврага пронизывает твои слова, Вольный Торговец! Подобными обещаниями власти и силы и устланы дороги, ведущие к ереси и погибели. Ты не отвратишь меня от моей стези!"

traits.locale_text: "Your words are tainted by the Archenemy's lies, Rogue Trader! Such promises of power are what paves the roads that lead to heresy and ruin. You will not lead me astray!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your words are tainted by the Archenemy's lies, Rogue Trader! Such promises of power are what paves the roads that lead to heresy and ruin. You will not lead me astray!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your words are tainted by the Archenemy's lies, Rogue Trader! Such promises of power are what pave the road to heresy and ruin. You will not lead me astray!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your words are tainted by the Archenemy's lies, Rogue Trader! Such promises of power are what pave the road to heresy and ruin. You will not lead me astray!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your words are tainted by the Archenemy's lies, Rogue Trader! Such promises of power are what pave the road to heresy and ruin. You will not lead me astray!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Vos propos sont souillés par les mensonges du Grand Ennemi, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! La route de l'hérésie et de la ruine est pavée de telles promesses de pouvoir. Vous ne me détournerez pas du droit chemin ! »
languages.original_text: "Your words are tainted by the Archenemy's lies, Rogue Trader! Such promises of power are what pave the road to heresy and ruin. You will not lead me astray!"

traits.locale_text: « Vos propos sont souillés par les mensonges du Grand Ennemi, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! La route de l'hérésie et de la ruine est pavée de telles promesses de pouvoir. Vous ne me détournerez pas du droit chemin ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Eure Worte sind von den Lügen des Erzfeinds vergiftet, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Die Straße zu Ketzerei und Verderben ist mit solchen Versprechungen der Macht gepflastert. Ihr werdet mich nicht vom wahren Pfad abbringen!"
languages.original_text: "Your words are tainted by the Archenemy's lies, Rogue Trader! Such promises of power are what pave the road to heresy and ruin. You will not lead me astray!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Worte sind von den Lügen des Erzfeinds vergiftet, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Die Straße zu Ketzerei und Verderben ist mit solchen Versprechungen der Macht gepflastert. Ihr werdet mich nicht vom wahren Pfad abbringen!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Sus palabras están manchadas por las mentiras del Archienemigo, Comerciante Independiente! Estas promesas de poder son las que conducen a la herejía y la ruina, ¡y no dejaré que me haga caer!».
languages.original_text: "Your words are tainted by the Archenemy's lies, Rogue Trader! Such promises of power are what pave the road to heresy and ruin. You will not lead me astray!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Sus palabras están manchadas por las mentiras del Archienemigo, Comerciante Independiente! Estas promesas de poder son las que conducen a la herejía y la ruina, ¡y no dejaré que me haga caer!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたの言葉は仇敵の嘘に汚染されているぞ、自由開拓者（ローグトレーダー）！そんな力の約束は、異端と破滅に繋がるだけだ！私を迷わせるのやめてくれ！」
languages.original_text: "Your words are tainted by the Archenemy's lies, Rogue Trader! Such promises of power are what pave the road to heresy and ruin. You will not lead me astray!"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの言葉は仇敵の嘘に汚染されているぞ、自由開拓者（ローグトレーダー）！そんな力の約束は、異端と破滅に繋がるだけだ！私を迷わせるのやめてくれ！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “你的话语充满了混沌大敌的谎言，行商浪人！像这样的承诺，只会为异端与毁灭铺平道路！别以为我会被你诱入歧途！”
languages.original_text: "Your words are tainted by the Archenemy's lies, Rogue Trader! Such promises of power are what pave the road to heresy and ruin. You will not lead me astray!"

traits.locale_text: “你的话语充满了混沌大敌的谎言，行商浪人！像这样的承诺，只会为异端与毁灭铺平道路！别以为我会被你诱入歧途！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Şerbaşı'nın yalanları, dilini zehirlemiş Hür Tüccar! Bu tür güç vaatleri, kâfirliğe ve yıkıma giden yolun taşlarıdır. Beni doğru yoldan saptıramazsın!"
languages.original_text: "Your words are tainted by the Archenemy's lies, Rogue Trader! Such promises of power are what pave the road to heresy and ruin. You will not lead me astray!"
